Subject: Ways of revising how the radar function acts
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=62491402
X-Yahoo-Profile: alternate_dph

Ok, I'd like to hear feedback on your experiences with the radar in
Gladiator.  Do you guys think the existing symbols on the radar screen
are adequate or do you think possibly, some things need to change in
terms of how objects are presented on the radar map in the game of
gladiator?

Right now, that's what's I'm working on with these thumbnails images -
essentially using a ported-out Radar function with my personal ideas
for changes I think would make things better.

It's better to address the issue now, so that when the folks at
Snowstorm actually do get around to revising the Radar code, we can
get our suggestions implemented off the bat.
